item.title: Helm for K8s Cluster
item.description: I’ve successfully set up Helm as the package manager for my Raspberry Pi Kubernetes Cluster, enabling easy discovery, sharing, and use of Kubernetes software. After installing Helm, I set up the NGINX Ingress Controller using Helm for external access. Additionally, I configured MetalLB as a layer 2 load balancer to manage external IP addresses. Revisiting my Gitea setup, I updated the service configuration to leverage MetalLB, enhancing the overall scalability and efficiency of my Kubernetes environment on Raspberry Pi. Helm proves to be a valuable tool for managing Kubernetes packages effortlessly.
